name: Hidden Power
note: All Pok√©mon who can learn TMs can learn Hidden Power except Wobbuffet, Wynaut, Kricketot, Tynamo, and Spewpa.
summary: Deals damage. Type is determined depending on the user's IV spread. For a Hidden Power calculator section, visit the Tools section in the sidebar. For a generic Hidden Power table, see the Tutorials section.
viability: Hidden Power is what Pokemon use when they are in dire need of a coverage move of that type. For example, Gorebyss doesn't have any good Grass moves, so it needs to run Hidden Power Grass. Roserade needs a Fire move so it runs Hidden power Fire. Roserade, actually, makes great use of it due to its Technician ability, boosting it to a respectable 90 base power. Hidden Power is a good move to have, but should only be used as a last resort.
